thread.title: Maria Magi

author: Maria Magi
title: Maria Magi
text: Enjoyed the ease of use of the site and materials for study are presented in 3 different ways to aid in your learning style. Audio playback of each page in a chapter, visual presentations for signs and navigation material, you can also read along or read the course material on your own time and speed. Practice exams after ever chapter allows you to track if you have understood and retained the learning Material. I passed with 80% on the first try after just 3 hours over 2 weekends of study. I recommend this site to my friends!
